title: Agent Nexus HITL
description: Designed and built a standalone agentic system that implements a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) workflow.
longDescription: Designed and built a standalone agentic system that implements a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) workflow. Tech Stack: LlamaIndex, FastAPI, Groq API, Redis, Docker.

title: Quantum Tutor (Google GenAI Hackathon): Socratic Agent
description: Developed the Backend and architected the core agentic logic into a scalable Dockerized solution till deployment.
longDescription: Developed the Backend and architected the core agentic logic into a scalable Dockerized solution till deployment. Tech Stack: FastAPI, LlamaIndex, MongoDB, Docker.

title: Transformer-based Multi-Agent RL for Urban Traffic Optimization
description: Engineered multi-agent DQN agents utilizing Transformer encoder architectures to manage urban intersections.
longDescription: Engineered multi-agent DQN agents utilizing Transformer encoder architectures to manage urban intersections. Tech Stack: Python, PyTorch, Transformer Architecture, Deep Q-Networks (DQN), SUMO.
